versionDescription: c-20090516-1616 is a version of Minecraft Classic released 9 minutes after the last to add mouse invert and fix mouse looking code.
additions: <irc> Pressing 'Y' now swaps the mouse Y-axis.
bugs:
There were issues reported about bad mouse movement.
The mouse is centered in the applet but still visable.

This version had texture issues
The textures are all white.
<irc> FPS will drop when turning the camera
trivia: An old inaccurate recreation of this version orginally had pink textures and not white.
